thread.title: Oregon Ducks' to wear uniforms honoring Oregon Trail, Lewis & Clark on Saturday
thread.title_full: Oregon Ducks' to wear uniforms honoring Oregon Trail, Lewis & Clark on Saturday | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Oregon Ducks' to wear uniforms honoring Oregon Trail, Lewis & Clark on Saturday
text:
The uniforms worn by the Oregon Ducks football team have revolutionized the industry with unusual, innovative and radical designs.
The Ducks' Nike-designed uniforms have become a "must-see" item before every Oregon game. The Ducks will blaze a new trail when they are expected to wear their new "Oregon Pioneers" uniform when they host Washington State Saturday at Autzen Stadium. The uniforms will honor the Oregon Trail and Lewis & Clark.
New Oregon Pioneers Uniform from @usnikefootball #GoDucks http://t.co/XvmcDVkMsx pic.twitter.com/BvKqP42mf1
â€” Oregon Football (@WinTheDay) October 5, 2015
The helmets feature a silhouette of Lewis and Clark and the Oregon Duck.
"For this inspiring new uniform, we want to celebrate the state and its great founders and innovators," Todd Van Horne, Creative Director for Nike Football, told goducks.com .
One silhouette is holding a telescope and the others are pointing.
What do you think of the uniforms?
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
